newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-HEYNCKES TO LEAVE TENERIFE, SEEN AS NEXT REAL MANAGER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-HEYNCKES TO LEAVE TENERIFE, SEEN AS NEXT REAL MANAGER.

text.p: Tenerife manager Jupp Heynckes said on Friday that he would not stay at the club next season, fuelling speculation that he may take over from Fabio Capello at Real Madrid.
Heynckes, whose side missed out on a UEFA Cup final place in Tuesday's game at Schalke, announced his decision in the wake of renewed rumours that Capello will go back to struggling AC Milan.
"This decision is independent of what I will do in my future," said Heynckes, adding that he had not begun negotiations with any other club.
Heynckes has had several well-publicised clashes with the Tenerife board over signing new players and the transporting of the team to games from their Canary Island base.
